item.title: Visual Studio Tips for Dynamics 365 Finance Operations
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Essential Visual Studio configuration tips for Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations development. Optimize your development environment with best practices, build settings, and custom toolbars.

item.title: Azure Storage Emulator 'Port conflict with existing application', Dynamics 365 finance and operations
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Troubleshooting guide for resolving Azure Storage Emulator port conflicts in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations OneBox environments with step-by-step solutions.

item.title: SSRS Report Server Settings Validation Error- AX 2012 R3 CU9
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: Resolve SSRS Report Server settings validation error in Dynamics AX 2012 R3 CU9 by disabling UAC through registry modification. Fix for Web Service URL and Report Manager URL configuration issues.

item.title: Modify Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R3 SSRS configurations using PowerShell
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Hi there, this is Max Nguyen)
item.description: PowerShell scripts to modify SSRS configuration files for Dynamics AX 2012 R3 including Report Manager, Report Server, and security policy configurations. Complete automation scripts for SSRS setup.
